channel.title: Unable to log in [525]
channel.description:
Hey :) I used to run a private server 2 years ago and recently finished my studying and now have plenty of time. So i decided to get a decent source, work on it, and maybe someday get it up and running for the public.
This is the source i used:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459671.0.html
My problem is, Im unable to log in :l it says "error connecting to server" or "invalid username/password" No clue what's wrong. I believe i have changed the ip to localhost ip wherever required.
client.java loader.java Class68_Sub20_sub15
Help would be appreciated.
